members.name: MUTE
members.comment: Represents a control for the mute status of a line. Note that mute status does not affect gain.

members.name: APPLY_REVERB
members.comment: Represents a control for whether reverberation is applied to a line. Note that the status of this control not affect the reverberation settings for a line, but does affect whether these settings are used.
Constructs a new boolean control type.

param: name - the name of the new boolean control type

name: javax.sound.sampled.BooleanControl$Type
comment: An instance of the BooleanControl.Type class identifies one kind of boolean control. Static instances are provided for the common types.
